Articles.Content:
Greetings, fellow Kerbanauts. Other people made impossible new years resolutions, I only made one: Start a thread in the exchange forum.

Easy karma points.

This craft is my main mun lifter. Cargo only at this point, landings are proving a lot tricker than I supposed, if only because fuel vs. weight is a delicate balancing act. Since it relies heavily on the Down Under Parts Pack I chose to dub it:

The Thunder From Down Under

First Stage Seperation:

Second Stage Seperation:

What would be a trans-munar burn, if I wasn\'t too lazy to actually make the journey in my photoshoot:

The last engine in the stack, for preforming corrective manuevers and entering the proper munar orbit:

Inside the pod:

Close up:

Bringing up the front of the procession is the Down Under advanced crew capsule, which has enough fuel for a free return trajectory and retro burn, if you play your cards (read: fuel) right.

Tell me, do you come from down under?

Where women blow and men plunder?

Can\'t you hear, can\'t you hear the thunder?

You\'d better run, and you\'d better take cover.

Because I accidentally the whole space centre.
